title: Workday cuts 400 jobs amid software stock meltdown
full_text:
Workday cuts 400 jobs amid software stock meltdown. The software company is one of many whose shares have taken a beating as investors raise concerns about the impact of AI.. Dado Ruvic/REUTERS
  • Workday announced layoffs affecting about 2% of its workforce, mostly those in customer-service roles.
  • The company said it's realigning resources while continuing … [+1902 chars]
